name: Maintenance Report
about: Report maintenance tasks or technical debt
title: 'Maintenance: '
labels: maintenance
assignees: ''
---

## Maintenance Task Description
A clear and concise description of the maintenance work needed.

## Type of Maintenance
- [ ] Code refactoring
- [ ] Dependency updates
- [ ] Performance optimization
- [ ] Documentation updates
- [ ] Technical debt reduction
- [ ] Security updates
- [ ] Other (please specify)

## Current State
Describe the current state of the code/system that needs maintenance.

## Desired State
Describe what the code/system should look like after maintenance.

## Benefits
Explain the benefits of completing this maintenance task:
- Improved performance
- Better code quality
- Reduced technical debt
- Enhanced security
- Other benefits

## Impact Assessment
- Estimated effort: [e.g., Small/Medium/Large]
- Risk level: [e.g., Low/Medium/High]
- Urgency: [e.g., Can wait/Should do soon/Critical]

## Additional Context
Add any other context, code snippets, or related issues here.
